title: dhIm dhIm tanana (tillAnA)
sahitya:
dhIm dhIm tanana dhirana dhImta dhiranA nAdhrutAni tomdhrutAni dhrudhru


anupallavi

  nadhru dhru dhIm tom dhrudhru dhIm tanadhirana tadharadAni udana dhImdhIm tanana 
nAdhru tAni tomdhrutAni dhrudhrudhIm tanana dhrudhIm tanana dhIm tanana tanana


caraNam    rAkEnduvana krta jaNAvana nA cintalanu vEga dIrcci nannu 
rakSincuTakidi samayamurA dharaNijA manOhara shrInivAsa
			(shorkkaTTusvaram)
tAm kiTata padanidama takatajhaNu dhImkiTata takatiku rigAmadani 
takiTataka jhamta saririsanida tadhingiNatOm tadhIngiNatOm tadhIngiNatOm
